instruction: Design a product to address a given issue.
input: The issue is that the elderly don't have access to the same technology as younger people.
output: A product should be designed which allows the elderly to easily access and control modern technology, such as smartphones and computer systems. The product should have a user-friendly interface with clear, easy to understand instructions and intuitive design. It should also be able to be set up and operated without any prior experience with technology.
